bug.summary: Getting a lot of "cannot import name 'introspection_query'" errors

I have the same issue here - any news on this bug?

I think this is an issue with the python graphql library version. The most recent version of wandb should have addressed this. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/haimat>@haimat</denchmark-link> what version are you using?

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/haimat>@haimat</denchmark-link>
Thanks for the solution. I am closing this ticket as of now. Please comment to reopen.
